Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Halsted
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, Wentworth, and 119th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, Wentworth, and 119th, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 119th/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Western (O'Hare)
ShortDescription:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (O'Hare) due to police activity.  
Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (O'Hare) due to police activity.  

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
